sentence.text: negative regulation of systemic arterial blood pressure signalling disruption caused by establishment of planar polarity (Vangl2Lp/+) or establishment of planar polarity (Celsr1Crsh/+) mutations significantly reduced trabecular bone mass and distal tibial cortical thickness.

sentence.text: These findings document shared genetic networks between spina bifida risk and bone structure, including negative regulation of systemic arterial blood pressure components and visual perception.
